response.overview: The musical documentary celebrates the intersection between art and nature. In the heart of the Jatobá Peri site, in the Pires neighborhood, talented artists and composers from Limeira perform songs amidst the natural landscape. The film not only captures unique musical performances, but also includes in-depth interviews, where the artists answer unusual questions from the director, revealing their views on music, nature and climate change.
response.tagline: The musical documentary celebrates the intersection between art and nature. In the heart of the Jatobá Peri site, in the Pires neighborhood, talented artists and composers from Limeira perform songs amidst the natural landscape.
response.title: Jatobá Peri Sessions
